name: WAR - WE ARE RIDERS (BETA)
description:
Hello! I am a small indie developer I have made this small racing game if there are bugs I will solve them in next update & updates will come regularly. Don't delete the game if you don't like it. If you want to donate and support me then you are welcome.

You have to setup the game and then you can play.

And most important tell me all issues like sound,gameplay,bugs etc.

Thank you

GameWonStudios
